verse: The Lord is my Shepherd. I will have everything I need.
He lets me rest in fields of green grass. He leads me beside the quiet waters.
He makes me strong again. He leads me in the way of living right with Himself which brings honor to His name.

Yes, even if I walk through the valley of the shadow of death, I will not be afraid of anything, because You are with me. You have a walking stick with which to guide and one with which to help. These comfort me.
You are making a table of food ready for me in front of those who hate me. You have poured oil on my head. I have everything I need.
For sure, You will give me goodness and loving-kindness all the days of my life. Then I will live with You in Your house forever.
